About Bryan

My name is Bryan Lim. I write short posts which take a minute to read.

I’m an independent programmer and founder of The Amazing Digital Asia, currently based in Singapore. I am also a student at NUS Business School. I run Shoppink and Monday as my day job and do iOS and Rails consulting for companies. You can hire me here.

The preferred way to reach me is on twitter @ytbryan or send me an email. I will take longer to reply on other medium.

Ask me a quick question on twitter  or email me

Thanks for reading! Enjoy your happy .
